animeDescription: A Nico Live broadcast of BanG Dream! franchise on Monday has announced a spin-off anime featuring one of the units in the franchise, Pastel*Palettes. Titled Pastel Life, the slice-of-life series is yet to announce its type and broadcast details.(Source: MAL News)
animeStaff: [['Uesaka, Sumire', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Ozawa, Ari', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Maeshima, Ami', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Nakagami, Ikumi', 'Theme Song Performance']]
